verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vyardham vyardham, sarvamu vyardham nashinchu lokam naashamu thadhyam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dusta lokamulo sarvamu chedenu deeni Yandam vaadi povu chunnadi povu chunnadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Choodan manaselaagu naashanamai poyen nindi yunna dipude paapapu paatra, paapapu paatra{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nalu dishalu choodumaa paapamu kaladu kalaha kalvaramulatho nindi yunnadi nindi yunnadi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokamlo nanni gathinchi povu navi lokam yentho ayogyambai yunnadi ayogyambade{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Iddaralo mana kemiyu ledu swaardham shatrutwam, eersha mayamu eershamayamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oka naadee mahini prabhuvu dahinchunu sakalambunu naashanambu cheyunu naashanamu cheyunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oka raajyamu vachchu nandu deevena kaladu sakala shaanti santosha mandu kaladu Anduna galadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
